website_summaries.verdict: The HP Officejet J4680 offers more features at a cheaper price than most of its competitors, and small offices and home professionals will appreciate its print quality as well. Unfortunately, its negatives far outweigh the positives: your office productivity will take a major hit because of  sluggish output speeds and faulty paper handling. For a better rounded all-in-one printer, we recommend picking up the Lexmark x7675 Pro or investing an extra $90 in the HP Officejet J6480.
cons: lacks page status monitor and media card reader

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: i had a HP printer that used the 901 cartridges. It died on me and i have 4 black and color boxes not even open. I loved the fact i was able to find this printer and it was affordable. I didn't have to waste my cartridges. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: roc

customer_reviews.title: Was refurbished and not indicated when buying it.
customer_reviews.text: It was even years old and not compatible with computer.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bubel

customer_reviews.title: Nice printer.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent printer works great. Does everything I want it to. I would highly recommend this product and company.
customer_reviews.author: McKya

customer_reviews.title: HP OfficeJet J4680
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer to replace another brand. What I really like about this Hp printer is that even if i run out of black are ink the printer will still print color or if I run out of color ink it still would print black. The other brand that had would not work if I ran out of black or color ink I would have to install whatever color I ran out of before I could print something. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Rudy P.

customer_reviews.title: There response was possibly bad printer head
customer_reviews.text: Have not had the product for a month.. Had to change cartridge. Will not print black.. Contacted HP. There response was possibly bad printer head. So I just wasted the money I paid for this. I contacted seller.. Sorry was all they said.. Beware buying used equipment.. NO WARRANTY..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hp trash delivery
customer_reviews.text: This was not a new item it was not in factory packing. Was shipped in shelf box not shipping carton. Paper tray was received left mirror glasswith broken mounting tang. Printer would not recognize paper was loaded. Would not print at all. Thanks for the paper weight
customer_reviews.author: Cleatus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with this printer and the way it was packaged with ink cartridge and instruction papers and cords.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: HP OJ J4680
customer_reviews.text: It worked right out of the box and contained all the elements to go to work. The setup was straight forward and extremely simple (windows XP). The print quality was excellent right from the start and the replacement cartridges were available and reasonable in cost. I am looking forward to exploring the many features of this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: J4680 DISABLED ON ARRIVAL
customer_reviews.text: had a J4680 BUT BOARD WAS SHOT>>YOURS DIDN'T WORK UPON ARRIVAL CAN'T REPAIR AND IS JUNK [NOT WORTH RETURNING?] HAVE STATEMENT FROM HP REPAIRS
customer_reviews.author: tommy may

customer_reviews.title: Good product and customer support overall
customer_reviews.text: I like the wireless capacity of this product but my computer has problems with it when it downloads updates. My computer does't want to accept it. I had alot of difficulty getting it to work intually with my computer. I called the support in which the guy was hard to understand. I had to give him control of my computer to get the printer software in the computer. It took two calls over two days, but it is finally in and working fine. Still having problems with downloading updates on my wireless computer though. Overall though I say it was worth the hassle so far anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid performer
customer_reviews.text: I have had no problems with this printer in the last year. HP software has done many updates to its software with many improvements. Most printer companies seldom ever update drivers. HP has done better than that by improving the software suite! Ink toners last along time with this unit. I would buy this model again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: T. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: HP OfficJjet J4680 All-in-one
customer_reviews.text: The printer installed easier than most printers I have used. The wireless connection set itself up with no problems. When I started detection of the printer from my second laptop, Windows 7 installed the printer, drivers and control programs without using the HP install disk. Print quality is slightly poorer than some cheap printers, but for $65, I am not complaining. I just wish the printer manufacturers could figure out how to do automatic FAX reception when you have voice mail or an answering machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HP Office Jet J4680 All-In-One Wireless Printer
customer_reviews.text: Works well, and takes a minimal amount of space. By works well, I mean that it scan's well, and prints well. No complaints. Although it can print wirelessly I have mine plugged directly into the laptop which I use as a desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent printer
customer_reviews.text: I'm late reviewing this product. I bought this printer about 5 years ago when my son graduated high school. It is currently still working good, no problems to date, just changed ink cartridges and back in business, wireless works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Muellner

customer_reviews.title: Awful Printer!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a loyal HP customer and am EXTREMELY disappointed in this product. And I mean EXTREMELY!!! I spent well over 10 hours with tech support trying to get this printer set up. Finally I got it working and then the scanner gave me nothing but problems. The scanner refuses to work to this day! I'm ready to give up and demand my money back. My computer won't recognize the stupid printer to this day either! For future customers, for your sanity, DO NOT BUY THIS PRINTER!!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this and it was very easy to set up and get running. I have a problem with my laptop connecting to it, though I'm not sure that is the printers problem. I'll figure it out. But for our primary computer this connected and tested and ran fine first time out of the box. It fits nicely in my office, makes great copies and prints pretty fast. For the price I couldn't beat it, but would have liked some more help from HP in figuring out the laptop thing.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Hate it.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this machine... for about a week. Unfortunately, it has a horrible habit of paper-jamming. Jams are not cleared easily, either. When printing quickly, it often grabs multiple sheets, causing a page to be split amongst several pieces of paper. It guzzles ink like a Hummer guzzles gasoline. Wireless is extremely buggy, requiring constant resets and reconfiguration. Had a last straw tonight when it, in quick succession, wasted eight sheets of paper during an important print job, ran out of ink, and jammed. It's going in the trash as soon as I can get another printer.
customer_reviews.author: Self-Publishing Composer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for my 8 year old all-in-one and it's wonderful! The ability to use it wirelessly is awesome and works perfectly. It is amazingly quiet and plenty fast for my needs. The scanner is quick and clear. I have yet to use the fax feature, but I'm sure it is equally as good. For basic home usage, this is a fantastic printer.
customer_reviews.author: Twin Mommy 628

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: This a very good printer and it seem to play well with the other wireless devices that I have on my network. However it is noisy and the fax keep going off and no fax appears, but the fax does work. Not a big problem it mostly gets ignored any way.
customer_reviews.author: Wildjr2

customer_reviews.title: Low budget, you get what you pay for. They f### you on the ink
customer_reviews.text: Horrible printer. Guzzles ink and doesn't work half the time the ink is prohibitively expensive. I stopped using it and will now throw it in the garbage and go back to my 8 year old laser printer.. Much better
customer_reviews.author: Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Nice little printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool printer. Easy to set up and operate. Wireless works great and is very convenient. They could work on the instruction manuals. They are a little weak. But this printer doesn't take a genius to figure out how to use anyway. Go buy one on sale. Amazon has the best price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stout

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Love is perfect and just what I wanted, great product, highly recommend, buy with confidence, I assure you will be satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Mirvida Laya

customer_reviews.title: Who do I call HP or Amazon?
customer_reviews.text: After inital set up, we had to unplug it and move it to another room and we can't get it to print or reconnect. It still faxes and copies. While it worked it was great. Nice colors and I loved the wireless feature.
customer_reviews.author: Gramma B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up - Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Simply - this is a great all-in-one printer. It was easy to set up to print wireless, and it only took a few minutes. The price is amazing for the quality. I'm very happy with this printer
customer_reviews.author: V. James

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this printer from Amazon a comany has so much following ,but was very disapponted ,got this item incomplete, missing was the software and manual needed to make the printer operational ....I have sent several emails to the supplier to take the product back...or replace with another printer or send me the missing software etc..but there is no reply from the supplier....I would appriciate if you would look in the matter and let me know asap. thank u. Suri Batra.....206 362 9122.
customer_reviews.author: skb

customer_reviews.title: Never buy a HP printer agian
customer_reviews.text: I needed a fourth printer and my 3 existing printers are HP. I purchased this printer based on price and it being an HP. After installing the new software, I am no longer able to Scan from any of my printers. Using HP fixes works until you restart computer. After speaking with others, this seems to be a problem with all new HP printers and their software. Do not buy HP.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: HP J4680 printer
customer_reviews.text: I am somewhat disappointed in that the printer is prone to paper jams. The paper feed jammed the first time I tried to print a document and has jammed several times since. I have not yet tried the Fax so am not sure how good that will be. I will attemp to contact HP about the paper jams
customer_reviews.author: Arthur A. Northrop

customer_reviews.title: For as much as I've moved, I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonderfully for about 4 years. :) Withstood quite a few moves. (lol)
customer_reviews.author: Rashida

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the best order i place for this item needed this real bad. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: BEV

customer_reviews.title: Sorry i bought it
customer_reviews.text: This looked so promising. But after hours and hours with HP service and it still doesn't work. It will not connect wirelessly on my desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: HP Printer
customer_reviews.text: Very compact printer, easy to install and the wireless feature is great. Highly recommend this item through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Moser

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm still using this over 7 years later. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: Hp officejet
customer_reviews.text: my order came on time and works fine.. easy to fix to my laptop.. was exactly how owner said it was..
customer_reviews.author: meme

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Wonder
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, works great for the money. Ink still costs too much in my opinion, does not come with the drivers for WINDOWS 7. You can download 300+ bytes or buy the CD from HP.
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Salvo

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, I have been using it since and there has been no problems whatsoever. The only thing is that when it warms up or prints, it may get a little loud, but personally I don't mind it, as long as I can finish the job.
customer_reviews.author: Xiang Li

customer_reviews.title: great, just dose everything
customer_reviews.text: from printing, scanning, copying it dose every thing just great. a great machine. yes, it is a little bit noisey, and takes about a minute to warm up. but it is great. makes lab quality pictures, and great coppies.
customer_reviews.author: chirdak

customer_reviews.title: My First Wireless Printer
customer_reviews.text: I use a laptop computer extensively so it made sense to purchase a wireless printer. My experience with HP products has been good so I chose the HP OfficeJet j4680 All-In-One Wireless Printer. It was easy to set up and update drivers through HP. I can print from other rooms in my house with ease. Thanks to Amazon.com ordering was easy and I was amazed how quickly the printer came.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Morgan

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. I have a home office with multiple computers and this fits my needs well. The Photo printing is impressive. The ink is not as expensive as my last HP cartridages. I mainly needed a wireless, multi-page scanner, printer/ copier and this item is my solution.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, wonderful price!
customer_reviews.text: For a 68 year old with no technical know-how this machine is a blessing. It was easy to install and so far has been problem free.
customer_reviews.author: Ralf  T

customer_reviews.title: Great printer
customer_reviews.text: After reading some reviews on this printer I expected to have some installation problems. Read the manual FIRST and every thing installed and worked within 15 min. One word of advice if for some reason you have to reinstall make sure all previous installations are deleted.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Myer

customer_reviews.title: review for home use
customer_reviews.text: the product is very satisfactory.the price is good considering the features.the small dimensions of the product is suitable for a small home office. the wireless feature is very useful for homes which makes use of portable devices such as laptops. the paper feeder sometimes jams. the automatic feeder for the scanner needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: CNC woodworker

customer_reviews.title: Worst HP Printer I ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first ever review I wrote. I owned several HP inkjet printers before I changed to this one. Ever since I got it, I had ink problem, connection problem and now I'm having sheet feed problem! In my opinion, stay away from this printer!
customer_reviews.author: Vei Chiang

customer_reviews.title: has a few moments
customer_reviews.text: I like this new printer it was easy to set up. We have it on the wireless. Sonetimes there is a delay, but not real long..l We still have a few issues with the receiving fax. But we are working on those. It is a good printer
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: HP Office Jet Printer
customer_reviews.text: I had a J4680 printer which I liked very much but it crashed after years of use. The one I ordered has turned out to be even better than the one I had. I'm a happy camper ..
customer_reviews.author: Dede Emerson

customer_reviews.title: no ink
customer_reviews.text: no ink .....it cost more to buy new ink cartriges...... just buy a new copyier with ink with new purchase........................
customer_reviews.author: bobby ray

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a second inexpensive printer that could operate without a wired connection from my laptop. I wanted a good quality print with a few steps from my laptop instead going to a different level of our split level home. This machine meets those requirements.
customer_reviews.author: D. STORM

customer_reviews.title: economical office
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a replacement for a printer just like it because it was so cheap and I already had ink for it. The bad thing about it is that I can't get the fax feature to work properly and if you pull the paper out when it jams at the front you will destroy your printer.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: good for it's price
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to get this printer, so far still can't setup wireless, which was the main option about this device. And, also, slow printing speed. Otherwise very nice, affordable, color printer. Allows you to do lots of cool stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Yana Malyshko

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: The printer never worked properly. The software slowed the computer and never worked right. After ~6 month, the scanning and faxing broke and after another month everything just stopped working...I am not even bothering to call HP. I don't want this printer even if they paid me. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: emanuele netzer

customer_reviews.title: HP Office Jet J4680 All in One wireless Printer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my printer years ago and it is still going strong, had no trouble with this printer, would purchase a similar model when this one finally breaks down.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great printer - the ink that came with it was trash
customer_reviews.text: The printer is decent. It does the job and is nice to have a wireless printer... But the ink that came with it was trash. Everyone of them failed.
customer_reviews.author: AZdadof5

customer_reviews.title: Best printer ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I just bought this printer after my 10 year old printer began to annoy me (leaking ink and cartridges evaporating), it's the best thing ever. Set up was a breeze and took less than 10 minutes. Feels good to be totally wireless. I highly recommend this printer. I've only had it an hour and already my life is easier!!
customer_reviews.author: naps8532

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: This printer is all and more than I expected for the price. I would not hesitate to recommend the printer to anyone, for ease of installation and learning to use this product. I would definitely give it a five star rating Sincerely, Ted Leenders
customer_reviews.author: Theodore W. Leenders

customer_reviews.title: great all-in-one printer
customer_reviews.text: Love it, easy install, can print from my laptop from any room in the house, how cool is that, no wires. I print from 3 machines, 2 wireless, one hardwired.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L.

customer_reviews.title: HP OfficeJet J4680 All-in-One Wireless Printer
customer_reviews.text: So far, I like this printer. My only concern is how fast printer cartridges are used up. Other than that, I am very pleased with all the features this prineter offers. Very nice printer for an home office. I would definitley reccommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Rob A.

customer_reviews.title: Seller of this product sold a piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: When we first plugged this printer in we immediately received a paper jam message. We never put the 1'st piece of paper even close to the machine. Never could get the error messages to clear. I did a lot of research into our new printer & decided on this one to replace our old HP that won't set up the scan status on our new computer. I don't blame this printer completely I blame the seller of the computer that was sent to us. I feel like they tried to sell something that was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Grahm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent services from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I bought this All-in-one wireless printer from Amazon, its very nice printing/faxing/scanning with wireless. I recommend it for people who like wireless, you can print it sitting anywhere inthe home
customer_reviews.author: V. R. M

customer_reviews.title: HP the workhorse of printers
customer_reviews.text: Over the past thirty years of engineering applications I have used only HP printers. I never experienced any jams or issues. I rely on consistant quality and reliability. HP always has provided me with both. this is my fifth HP all in one. It will also provide me with years of continual service, my last all in one is still in operation at my office. the latest purchase is for my home office applications. You can not put a price on quality, reliability, service and term of service.
customer_reviews.author: VegasGolf G

customer_reviews.title: Good Purxchse
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to set up. I used a hard line to the computer, so I don't know about the wireless setup. Printer arrived very quickly too. Haven't had any issues with it yet. Happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: at

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: THIS WIRELESS PRINTER, COPIER, SCANNER AND FAX (THE FAX IS NOT USED BY US) IS A VERY GOOD MACHINE. EXCELLENT FOR THE JOB I HAVE FOR IT. THAT IS USING IT IN THE KITCHEN FOR MY WIFE'S COMPUTER. VERY HANDY AND EASY TO USE.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lahood

customer_reviews.title: Stay far away from this
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but problems. Paper jam after paper jam. On third replacement from HP after hours on the phone. This printer is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Printer
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this printer. It has saved me money on faxes already since I purchsed it. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A. Harrell

customer_reviews.title: HP J4680
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a HP J4680. Its an outstanding product, and I recommend it to anyone wanting combo fax, scanner, printer.
customer_reviews.author: Jack B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Good quality printer, good price. Wireless works fine. Had to reload software twice, but otherwise very satisfied. Would reccomend to anyone looking for a wireless printer.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Ross

customer_reviews.title: HP officejet J4680 all in one wireless printer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this printer. It was easy to setup and works great with our two laptop computers and my netbook. Prints great and fast. Easy to use the scanner.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetsNThings

customer_reviews.title: printer
customer_reviews.text: It works nice good price fast shipping prints very fast ink cartridges are very cheap it has nice features it is very simple to use---thanks-----dick
customer_reviews.author: dick

customer_reviews.title: HP Officejet J4680 review
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and connect. The paper tray has problems catching heavier weight paper and feeding it through for printing.
customer_reviews.author: alemus2

customer_reviews.title: HP Wireless Printer
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit dissappointed with the noise when booting up and shutting down, but other than that, easy to set up, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Mccloskey

customer_reviews.title: The wireless is great
customer_reviews.text: Love love love that I don not have to plug in my lap top to print. Ink is pricey but the quality is great
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: cool printer
customer_reviews.text: i find that the printer is a little slow but it does everything i need at home
customer_reviews.author: Gerard E. Magnifico

customer_reviews.title: Don't get it!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it doesn't copy things. I will have to return it. And the functions are hard to use. There is no copy or fax button. You have to view a vindow and scroll to the function you want and press OK. And there is no back light on the window, so at night one needs to use a flashlight!!!
customer_reviews.author: Trudie

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to others
customer_reviews.text: Just recently received my HP all-in-one. So far I'm pleased with the quality of the product and the set-up was simple and quick. I've only used this a couple of times,everything works, it's a little noisy but that's OK. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: ChickenLady

customer_reviews.title: HP OfficeJet J4680 All-In-One product review
customer_reviews.text: This all-in-one printer system is a very user friendly machine. First of all, the product shipped and was delivered very fast. The initial setup time was under 10 minutes. I have only experienced one paper jam in over 50 print/copy/scan/fax job requests.
customer_reviews.author: adeps

customer_reviews.title: HP Officejet J4680
customer_reviews.text: A small but mighty machine! Others are a bit quieter, a bit faster, but for a home office, it is very adequate and MUCH cheaper! Easy to load the software.
customer_reviews.author: J Burress

customer_reviews.title: My all singing, all dancing HP Officejet J4680 All-in-One
customer_reviews.text: Everything you could ask for and more. When you live in a remote community in Alaska - reliability and functionality mean a lot. HP products and this Officejet provide all of that and it's perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Michael J. Webber USN (Ret)r

customer_reviews.title: More than You pay!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this printer, I was needing this printer, I don't like connect cables to my laptop and this printer solves my problem. I can work in any place in the house and print to low cost. Good Selection
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Ramirez Franco

product_meta.title: HP OfficeJet J4680 All-in-One Wireless Printer
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From the Manufacturer Want the convenience of wireless business printing? Print, fax, scan and copy, plus forget about messy printer cables with the HP Officejet J4680 All-in-One. Easily share your printer using built-in wireless[1] networking, and boost productivity with fast printing and faxing. 



Want to make the right impression every time? Create documents with sharp color graphics and laser-quality black text using the HP Officejet J4680 All-in-One. With the right paper, your most important documents will last for decades without fading[2].

Want to save paper? Use HP Smart Web Printing[3] to print web pages without ads, menu bars and other unnecessary info. Simply select the photos and text you want, organize it all on a single page and click “Print”. 

Want to save your business money? Print professional color for a lower cost per page than most lasers[4]. With the optional XL high-capacity black cartridge[5], you can even print up to three times more black pages than standard cartridges.

Want to print, fax, scan and copy with ease? Effortlessly manage your print jobs using the text display. Low on ink in one of your cartridges? This HP all-in-one will finish printing your document using the remaining tri-color or black cartridge.

Print wirelessly from any room with the HP Officejet J4680 All-in-One
Reduce the clutter of tangled cables under your desk or in the conference room using built-in wireless networking[1]. You’ll also improve productivity by sharing one printer with multiple people. 

Print wirelessly from any room. Boost your business image and your bottom line
Create your own marketing materials for less. Print professional color for a lower cost per page than lasers[4]. Avoid keeping outdated documents and storing extra copies by printing only what you need, when you need it. 

Make your own brochures, flyers and more using HP Brochure Paper and HP Tri-fold Brochure Paper. Find business templates and project ideas at www.hp.com/print 



Create your own marketing materials for less. Remember compatible ink, paper and accessories
HP, the #1 brand in ink is the #1 value[6]. The HP Officejet J4680 All-in-One uses two inks: black and tri-color. You can save money on black ink by choosing optional XL high-capacity cartridges[5]. 


Print all your business documents, from brochures and presentations to invoices and emails, using Original HP paper.

To easily connect your PC to this HP all-in-one, you’ll need a USB cable.

 See all the compatible inks and recommended papers here.

Get the specifics
PRINT SPEED: Up to 28 ppm black, up to 22 ppm color[7]
FAX: Up to 140-page fax memory, up to 99 speed dial numbers 
SCAN: Resolution up to 1200-dpi optical; maximum scan size 8.5" x 11.7"
COPY: Reduce/enlarge 25%–400%
PAPER HANDLING: 3" x 5" to 8.5" x 14"; up to 3,000 pages per month

What’s in the box?

 * HP Officejet J4680 All-in-One
 *  HP 901 Black Officejet Ink Cartridge
 *  HP 901 Tri-color Officejet Ink Cartridge
 *  Power supply 
 *  Power cord
 *  Phone cord
 *  Setup poster
 *  Fax Getting Started Guide
 *  Wireless Getting Started Guide
 *  CD-ROMs (for software)
 *  USB cable

HP Officejet
Affordable color printing for the home office. 


Give your business a boost
Looking for a laser printer? Buy the affordable alternative—HP Officejet. You’ll get the best of both: the laser quality your business needs at the low inkjet prices you want. Print professional color for a lower cost per page than most lasers[4].

Print impressive documents using Original HP ink
Want to avoid the chance of smearing, streaking and clogging? Choose Original HP ink for affordable, reliable printing and print 65% more pages than bargain inks[8]. Want to get more ink for less money? Buy the optional XL high-capacity black cartridge[5].

Reduce, reuse and recycle
Want to help your business go green? Easily save paper using HP Smart Web Printing[3]. Select text and photos from multiple websites, organize it all on a single page and click “Print”. To save even more paper, flip the page over manually and print on both sides. 

Since most HP Officejets are ENERGY STAR® qualified products, you can be sure you're saving power.

Did you know HP recycles your print cartridges for free? Visit www.hp.com/recycle for details. In 2006, HP recycled more than 164 million pounds of hardware and print cartridges—the same weight as 600 jumbo jets.

 

Print multiple websites all on a single page with HP Smart Web Printing[5]. Save energy in more 
ways than one with
an HP Officejet 


Choose the right product for you.

 Want wired networking and faster printing? Buy the HP Officejet 6500 All-in-One.




Want to print business documents on the go? Buy the HP Officejet H470wbt Mobile Printer.
